entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Mayor Card: City Management
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫4,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫3,99 [‚Ç∫2,99 ~ ‚Ç∫9,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫3,99

Application Description

RULE YOUR TOWN, BUILD YOUR CITY, BALANCE YOUR RESOURCES! Swipe each card with one finger, become mayor, make bold decisions, please your people and carve your own reign into history! Mayor Card fuses classic city-management simulation with lightning-fast swipe-card action to create a fresh strategy deck-builder. Drag every card left or right; collect taxes, protect nature, grow population and keep every resource bar alive. Let any gauge hit zero and you‚Äôre out of office‚Äîmaintain the balance, win, and unlock new cards to build an even greater city. KEY FEATURES ‚Ä¢ 740 Unique Cards - 740 unique choices‚Äîevery decision is yours! ‚Ä¢ Swipe & Decide ‚Äì Instant control, deep consequence. ‚Ä¢ Triple Balance System ‚Äì People, economy & nature; set tax rates, raise funds, stay green. ‚Ä¢ Chain Cards ‚Äì Risk-reward event chains; one move shapes the future. ‚Ä¢ Adventure Cards ‚Äì Call-Progress-Outcome stories; every deck hides new town legends. ‚Ä¢ Character Stories ‚Äì Treasure Hunter, Chef, Thief‚Ä¶ each NPC steers you to a different ending. ‚Ä¢ Endless Replayability ‚Äì Random decks, alternate finales: every management term feels new. LAUNCH DISCOUNT ‚Äî NOW LIVE! Limited-time offer for early mayors: swipe cards, grow your city, expand your town and rise as a legendary city leader. Download, govern and win today!

entry.title: Thumper: Pocket Edition
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

Application Description

*** Winner of Apple Design Award 2019 *** Thumper is rhythm violence: classic action, blistering speed, and brutal physicality. You are a space beetle. Brave the void and confront a maniacal giant head. With this special pocket edition, you can play all nine epic levels with one hand. Hurtle forward, master new moves, and survive terrifying boss battles. Propelled by a pounding original soundtrack, you'll feel every crushing impact. To reach synesthetic bliss, you must conquer rhythm hell. ‚ñ† Features ‚ñ† „Éª Nine epic levels „Éª Adrenalizing boss battles „Éª Psychedelic visuals and original soundtrack „Éª Smooth 60 FPS in portrait and landscape (and up to 120 FPS on supported devices) „Éª PLAY + mode (increased challenge and speed) „Éª Full screen display on iPhone X „Éª iCloud Sync ‚ñ† Please Note ‚ñ† Wireless headphones can add significant audio latency. For the best experience, wired headphones or integrated speakers are strongly recommended.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: The Witness
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫229,99 [‚Ç∫229,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99

Application Description

You wake up, alone, on a strange island full of puzzles that will challenge and surprise you. You don't remember who you are, and you don't remember how you got here, but there's one thing you can do: explore the island in hope of discovering clues, regaining your memory, and somehow finding your way home. The Witness is a single-player game in an open world with dozens of locations to explore and over 500 puzzles. This game respects you as an intelligent player and it treats your time as precious. There's no filler; each of those puzzles brings its own new idea into the mix. So, this is a game full of ideas.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Incredibox
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Incredibox lets you create your own music with the help of a merry crew of beatboxers. Choose your musical style to start laying down, recording and sharing your mix. Get your groove on with hip-hop beats, electro waves, pop voices, jazzy swing, Brazilian rhythms and much more. As well, discover a selection of mods created by the community. Plenty to keep you mixing for hours, with no ads or microtransactions. Part game, part tool, Incredibox is above all an audio and visual experience that has quickly become a hit with people of all ages. The right mix of music, graphics, animation and interactivity makes Incredibox ideal for everyone. And because it makes learning fun and entertaining, Incredibox is now being used by schools all over the world. How to play? Easy! Drag and drop icons onto the avatars to make them sing and start to compose your own music. Find the right sound combos to unlock animated choruses that will enhance your tune. Once your composition sounds great, just save it and share it to get as many votes as possible. If you get enough votes, you may go down in Incredibox history by joining the Top 50 chart! Ready to show your stuff? You can also download your mix as an MP3 from the app and listen to it over and over again! Too lazy to create your own mix? No problem, just let the automatic mode play for you! Pump it up and chill ;) **************** Incredibox, the brainchild of Lyon, France-based studio So Far So Good, was created in 2009. Starting out as a webpage, it was then released as a mobile and tablet app and became an instant hit. It has won several awards and appeared in various international media, including: BBC, Adobe, FWA, Gizmodo, Slate, Konbini, Softonic, Kotaku, Cosmopolitan, PocketGamer, AppAdvice, AppSpy, Vice, Ultralinx and many others. The online demo has attracted more than 100 million visitors since its creation.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: MiniGames Watch Games 24-in-1
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫19,99 ~ ‚Ç∫99,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

MiniGames is a collection of new, retro and modern games. You can play on your Apple Watch, iPhone or iPad with no Ads! It's like your own personal games arcade on the go. This collection of 24 games includes: ‚ñ† PONG Play one of the first video games ever created. This simple tennis like game is an absolute classic. ‚ñ† BRICK BREAK A fun retro falling brick game. Use the Digital crown or your finger to move the bricks around. Tap to rotate and swipe down to place the brick. Stack the bricks together to clear a line and score some points. ‚ñ† INVADERS Classic arcade action. Shoot all the space invaders before they get you. Hit the mothership for bonus points. ‚ñ† 2048 Enjoy the addictive 2048 game on your watch or phone. Swipe the number tiles around to join them. Join the tiles to reach 2048. ‚ñ† TUBE TWIST Guide your runner down an endless tube. Twist the tube to avoid the holes and spikes. Collect the yellow power orbs, the more you collect the longer you can speed boost. Tap your player to activate your speed boost. Hit the red jumps while boosting to get your bonus score. ‚ñ† BUBBLE Classic match 3 puzzle game. Connect the bubbles by color to clear them. ‚ñ† MISSILE How long can you survive a deadly onslaught of homing missiles? Maneuver your fighter plane to avoid the missiles and make them crash into each other. ‚ñ† HOP Jump from platform to platform to gain more height and points. Shoot the winged baddies along the way. ‚ñ† Drift Enjoy high octane drifting down a treacherous road. One false move and down you go. Try and survive as long as you can to get the top score. Collect the stars for bonus points. ‚ñ† Cong It's like pong, but in a circle. Use the digital crown to move the paddle around the circle and keep the ball in play. ‚ñ† Tower Build your Tower by stacking colourful blocks on top of each other. Place them perfectly for bonus points. ‚ñ† FLAP Guide the bird through a never ending forest by flapping your wings. ‚ñ† FROG ROAD Help the cute frogs avoid the cars and cross the road. A 3D update to the classic Frogger game. ‚ñ† BLOCK RUN Feel like going for a a run? Help the voxel guy avoid the colourful obstacles by jumping, rolling and turning around the corners. ‚ñ† MATCHTRIS A mashup of Tetris and Dr. Mario. Move the falling blocks to match 4 or more colors to clear them. Setup the blocks to fall and match for combos and extra points. ‚ñ† DRONE Pilot your drone down the never ending corridors of an Alien spaceship. ‚ñ† THRUST Strap your rocket boots on and zoom down a dark cave. Thrust combines a classic cave flyer game with elements of flappy bird. ‚ñ† SUPER JUMP We‚Äôve taken the fun of the humble platformer game and mashed it with an endless runner. Keep your player running by jumping over holes, ditches and enemies. Collect fruit to score points and the more you score the faster you run. ‚ñ† RETRO RACER Inspired by pseudo 3d racing games like Outrun and Pole Position but with modern graphics. Enjoy the surreal, exhilarating sense of speed while you race to beat the clock. Please note this game requires a watch series 4 or newer. ‚ñ† CONTRA PANG A mashup of Contra‚Äôs shooting action and the bubble popping fun of Pang. ‚ñ† CIRCLE INVADERS A new twist to the classic Space Invaders. With a unique circular design and lots of power-ups. ‚ñ† MOON SNAKE We took the classic fruit eating snake and put him on the moon. Avoid the bombs and your own tail to survive. ‚ñ† DUAL BREAK What could be better than the classic paddle game Breakout? How about power-ups and an extra paddle to control. ‚ñ† CIRCLE BREAK It‚Äôs like Pong in a Circle meets Breakout. Keep the ball from leaving the circle and break all the obstacles to finish the stage. Features: ‚Ä¢ No ads! ‚Ä¢ Apple Watch support ‚Ä¢ Screen shake ‚Ä¢ Vibrations ‚Ä¢ Sound Effects ‚Ä¢ Music ‚Ä¢ Leaderboards

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Overwinter Survival
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫9,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫2,99 [‚Ç∫2,99 ~ ‚Ç∫9,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫2,99

In-App Purchases

  • Standard PackÔºö‚Ç∫4,99
  • Elite PackÔºö‚Ç∫59,99
  • Advanced PackÔºö‚Ç∫19,99
  • Premium PackÔºö‚Ç∫34,99

Application Description

Overwinter Survival is a card-based survival game in which you are stranded on the glaciers of Greenland. The cold and loneliness ensnare you after your plane breaks down for an unknown reason, leaving you crashed on Greenland's glaciers and seeking shelter at a nearby cabin. Now you must hunt, craft tools and items, and keep your stove fueled to survive in the cold. In Overwinter Survival, you must use the cards you're dealt to stay alive. You can only use one card per round. With Lady Luck at the helm, no two journeys will be the same. Fish in the glaciers, hunt with your spear and craft an axe at your workshop to become a lumberjack. To get out of this frozen hell and see your family once again, you must stay alive and repair your plane. Experience a unique journey each time you play with randomly generated card decks and test your survival skills while pushing your luck amidst the frozen glaciers.

Application Screenshot

iPhone
